DOC.brief_summary: Low back pain common cause visit emergency department . It clear skeletal muscle relaxant benefit patient acute low back pain . This randomized study determine skeletal muscle relaxant , combine naproxen , improve outcome naproxen alone
DOC.detailed_description: Patients acute , non-traumatic , non-radicular low back pain enrol time discharge emergency department . Participants follow telephone one week 3 month ED visit
DOC.criteria: LBP duration < = 2 week No trauma low back within previous month No radicular symptoms No history low back pain history infrequent episodes Medication allergy contraindication Not available followup Chronic pain syndrome
